name: Endless Battle (itch) (OdinsRavenDev, Dekiru_dev)
description:
Endless Battle is a side-scrolling endless runner-style game, but with fighting elements as well. You are equipped with your trusty sword which you use to defeat enemies and destroy objects like vases to collect coins.

Coins can be used to unlock additional characters to play with. Characters have no effect on the game and are purely cosmetic only. However, each character has a unique back story and lore which is another incentive for you to unlock them. You aim to survive as long as you can and see what great distances you’ve traveled. Your distance is saved online for you to compare with other players. 

Controls:

Jump = space
Attack = m

The game should run perfectly on mobile devices.

Please forgive me for the odd resolution, but since this game was designed and built from the ground up with mobile in mind, the UI and everything becomes odd when trying to build for regular 16:9 displays.
